0.cdata!:
Tunisie - Deuxième secteur agricole prêt
            Investissement Projet

theme: Water resource management,Participation and civic engagement,Rural services and infrastructure,Rural policies and institutions,Decentralization

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Agricultural Sector
            Investment Loan seeks to: i) increase rural incomes derived
            from sustainable use of water resources and the effective
            development, delivery and adoption of improved farming
            practices; and ii) enhance institutional responsiveness to
            user demand for agricultural research, extension and
            training.  The project has four components.  First,
            small-scale irrigation will result in expansion in area,
            modernization, and installation of drainage systems.
            Second, groundwater prospecting and monitoring will include
            drilling of 212 exploratory tubewells, 115 piezometers, and
            acquisition of one geophysical resistivity unit. Third,
            research will support specific priority research projects.
            Fourth, extension and training will finance rehabilitation
            of seven existing training centers and the upgrading of the
            central training unit at Sidi Thabet.
